https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dMxExNLvBx7bqvIxIiT1skqbHPH.jpg Vaccuum salesman Evert makes the rounds in a suburban Stockholm apartment building, getting brief glimpses of the various tenants' lives. During the course of the day, he meets an arguing married couple, a lonely older woman and a younger couple preparing an anxious dinner. Days Like This
